text: Lupton () is an unincorporated community and census-designated place (CDP) in Apache County, Arizona, United States. Lupton is near Interstate 40 at the New Mexico border. It is southwest of Gallup, New Mexico. As of the 2020 census, the Lupton CDP had a population of 19. ==References== Category:Census- designated places in Arizona Category:Unincorporated communities in Arizona
title: Lupton, Arizona
